attributes.action: Stop the closure of Riverside Business and Enterprise College without true public deliberation and a balanced debate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Leicester City Council is currently taking proceedings to close Riverside Business and Enterprise College without we feel true reflection upon its decision and any public consultation. This decision will now go to cabinet based on a rushed document submitted to the council which we feel was unbalanced. No alternatives to closure have been considered, and no positive investment made into the college. Please help us to have our voices heard.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop the closure of Riverside Business and Enterprise College without true public deliberation and a balanced debate."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
